dyeHardProceduralAPI

Class APIDebris

  • java.lang.Object
    • Engine.Primitive
      • dyehard.DyehardRectangle
        • dyehard.DyeHardGameObject
          • dyehard.Collision.CollidableGameObject
            • dyehard.Obstacles.Debris
              • dyeHardProceduralAPI.APIDebris
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    dyehard.Updateable

    public class APIDebris
extends dyehard.Obstacles.Debris
    APIDebris is a sub class of Dyehard OOAPI Debris class. The purpose of this class is to initialize debris with the ability to identify the subtype (name) of each debris generated.
    Author:
    vuochnin

    • Constructor Detail

      • APIDebris

        public APIDebris(int type,
                 float minX,
                 float maxX)
        Constructor to initialize a debris
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the debris as Integer (There're 3 types)
        minX - the left boundary of the spawning region
        maxX - the right boundary of the spawning region

      • APIDebris

        public APIDebris(int type,
                 float minX,
                 float maxX,
                 float minY,
                 float maxY)
        Constructor to initialize a debris
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the debris as Integer (There're 3 types)
        minX - the left boundary of the spawning region
        maxX - the right boundary of the spawning region
        minY - the lower boundary of the spawning region
        maxY - the upper boundary of the spawning region

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the types of the Debris as String. Types are: "Plate", "Light", and "Pipe"
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
